name: Knight's Apprentice, Memorick's Adventures
storyline: Long ago in an age of wonder, when the era of men was still in its infancy, there was an island in the sky Avalon. From her floating domain, the Goddess Mob watched over all of the lands. Merlin used all of his strength to defeat her. A decode passed, and Avalon remained safe. But evil, it seems, would not easily renounce its claim over Avalon. For a veiled threat now casts its sinister shadow upon the land. In the game, you play as Memorick, a young apprentice knight. In the game you'll venture your way through a world of mythical.
